name: automatic-save-folder
short_description:
When downloading a file, Automatic Save Folder will automatically select the folder where the file will be be saved to according to filters and allows creating folders based on dynamic variables, like the date of the day or the filename's extension, domain's name, etc. 


This project is not active but not abandoned.
===============================
I just don't have time to maintain it, but will come back to it later.

Last compatible version :
Firefox 31



Issue report and comments and reviews
----------------------------------------------------------
Please, don't report that it's not working on latest Firefox, I already know.
This is open source and you can help and contribute to development if you want.

You can post reviews based on working state of the add-on (use Firefox 31 for example) to make a constructive review about the available add-on features.
summary: Automatic Save Folder is a Mozilla Firefox add-on.
